<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Add a new Device with Personal vDisk to acollection.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DeviceName: Computer name with nospaces. ASCII computer name characters Max Length=15</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid CollectionId: GUID of the Collection thisDevice with Personal vDisk is to be a member of. It is not used withCollectionName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string CollectionName: Name of the Collection thisDevice with Personal vDisk is to be a member of. SiteName or SiteId must alsobe used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk Locator toupdate with this Device.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site the CollectionName isto be a member of. This or SiteName is used with CollectionName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site the CollectionNameis to be a member of. This or SiteId is used with CollectionName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsPhysicalAddress DeviceMac: Ethernet address canhave the form XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX. Uniquely identifies the Device with PersonalvDisk.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Port: UDP port to use with Stream Service.Min=1025, Max=65534, Default=6901</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdTimestamp: The time the Active Directorymachine account password was generated. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdSignature: The signature of the ActiveDirectory machine account password. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogLevel: Level to perform logging at. Valuesare: 0 (None), 1 (Fatal), 2 (Error), 3 (Warning), 4 (Info), 5 (Debug), and 6(Trace). Min=0, Max=6, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainName: Fully qualified name of thedomain that the Device with Personal vDisk belongs to. Do not set this field,it is only set internally by PVS. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainObjectSID: The value of the objectSIDAD attribute of the same name for the Device with Personal vDisk's computeraccount. Do not set this field, it is only set internally by PVS.Default="" Max Length=186</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainControllerName: The name of the DC usedto create the host's computer account. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default="" Max Length=4000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime DomainTimeCreated: The time that thecomputer account was created. Has the date and time including milliseconds. Donot set this field, it is only set internally by PVS. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Type: 3 when it has a Personal vDisk, 4 when ithas a Personal vDisk and performs tests. Min=3, Max=4, Default=3</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string PvdDriveLetter: Personal vDisk Drive letter.Range is F to Z. Default="" Max Length=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LocalWriteCacheDiskSize: The size in GB toformat the Device cache file disk. If the value is 0, then the disk is notformatted. Min=0, Max=2048, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter BdmBoot: If -BdmBoot is specified,user BDM instead of PXE boot. PXE boot is used by default.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid XdSiteId: GUID of the XenDesktop Site.Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint XdCatalogId: Integer identifier of theXenDesktop Catalog. Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid VirtualHostingPoolId: GUID that uniquelyidentifies the Virtual Hosting Pool for a VM. This is needed when Adding a VMdevice. Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk: If successful, the newPvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk object is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk with PersonalvDisk named theDevice in theCollection of theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk -Name theDevice -DeviceMac"00-11-22-33-44-55" -SiteName theSite -CollectionName theCollection</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">CollectionId can be used instead of CollectionNameso that the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk named theDevicein theCollection of theSite with all fields set different than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk -Name theDevice-DeviceMac "00-11-22-33-44-55" -SiteName theSite -CollectionNametheCollection -Description "XenServer Device" -ClassName C -Port 6000-LogLevel 3 -Type 4 -PvdDriveLetter G -LocalWriteCacheDiskSize 100 -BdmBootXdSiteId "bd712b52-a262-4aa2-9c36-1602efe07f57" -XdCatalogId 5-VirtualHostingPoolId "15e0544e-4cf9-449e-b47f-8d836b16026f"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Do not set AdTimestamp, AdSignature, DomainName,DomainObjectSID, DomainControllerName and DomainTimeCreated. They are only setinternally by PVS.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">CollectionId can be used instead of CollectionNameso that the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Create PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk and Boot it
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk with PersonalvDisk named theDevice in theCollection of theSite and Boots it.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDeviceWithPersonalvDisk -Name theDevice-DeviceMac "00-11-22-33-44-55" -SiteName theSite -CollectionNametheCollection | Start-PvsBoot</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">CollectionId can be used instead of CollectionNameso that the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
##New-PvsDirectory<a name="_Toc464196205"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a Directory on the Server specified.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or ServerId: GUID of the Server tocreate a Directory on.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or ServerName: Name of the Server tocreate a Directory on.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Path: Path of the new Directory to create.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">ServerId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: New-PvsDirectory for Name
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDirectory -Name theServer -Path"C:\directory\subdirectory"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: New-PvsDirectory for PvsServer Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsServer output is piped to theNew-PvsDirectory.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsServer -Name theServer -Fields Guid |New-PvsDirectory -Path "C:\directory\subdirectory"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
##New-PvsDiskLocator<a name="_Toc464196206"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new Disk Locator for a Site. The Disk filemust already exist.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator File. It is unique within the Store. ASCII Max Length=52</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site this DiskLocator is tobe a member of. It is not used with SiteName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site this DiskLocatoris to be a member of. It is not used with SiteId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that this DiskLocator is a member of. SiteName or SiteId must also be used. It is not usedwith StoreName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that this DiskLocator is a member of. SiteName or SiteId must also be used. It is not usedwith StoreId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string MenuText: Text that is displayed in the BootMenu. If this field has no value, the name value is used. Default=""ASCII Max Length=64</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid ServerId: GUID of the single Server that thisDisk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerName.Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string ServerName: Name of the single Server thatthis Disk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerId.Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Disabled: If -Disabled is specified,the disk can not be booted. By default the disk can be booted.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter RebalanceEnabled: If-RebalanceEnabled is specified, this Server can automatically rebalanceDevices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RebalanceTriggerPercent: Percent over fair loadthat triggers a dynamic Device rebalance. Min=5, Max=5000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint SubnetAffinity: Qualifier for subnet affinitywhen assigning a Server. 0=None, 1=Best Effort, 2=Fixed. Min=0, Max=2,Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string NewDiskWriteCacheType: The WriteCacheTypethat if a new Disk will be created, it will be set with. It is only used when anew Disk is being created. Value are: 0 (Private), (other values are standardimage) 1 (Cache on Server), 3 (Cache in Device RAM), 4 (Cache on Device HardDisk), 6 (Device RAM Disk), 7 (Cache on Server, Persistent), or 9 (Cache inDevice RAM with Overflow on Hard Disk) Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter VHDX: If -VHDX is specified, theformat of the image the DiskLocator is being added for that has never been addedto the Farm is VHDX. Otherwise it is assumed to be VHD.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDiskLocator: If successful, the newPvsDiskLocator object is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsDiskLocator with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDiskLocator named theDiskLocator intheSite and theStore.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDiskLocator -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsDiskLocator with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDiskLocator named theDiskLocator intheSite and theStore with all fields set different than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDiskLocator -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore -Description "XenServer DiskLocator"-MenuText "XenServer Disk" -ServerName theServer -Disabled-RebalanceEnabled -RebalanceTriggerPercent -50 -SubnetAffinity -1-NewDiskWriteCacheType 9 -VHDX</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">-NewDiskWriteCacheType 9 (Cache in Device RAM withOverflow on Hard Disk) is an important parameter since this is the most optimalcache type.</span></p>
##New-PvsDiskMaintenanceVersion<a name="_Toc464196207"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a Maintenance version for the Disk Locator.Returns a PvsDiskVersion when successful.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk LocatorFile to Enable Disk Maintenance on.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this required ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator File to Enable Disk Maintenance on.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that is needed whena DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DiskLocatorId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDiskVersion: If successful, the newPvsDiskVersion object is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: New-PvsDiskMaintenanceVersion
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This example create a maintenance version for anexisting DiskLocator. It returns a PvsDiskVersion when successful.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskVersion = New-PvsDiskMaintenanceVersion-Name theDiskLocator -SiteName theSite -StoreName theStore</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if ($thePvsDiskVersion -ne $null)</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskVersion.Name    #display the name of the version file</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
##New-PvsDiskUpdateDevice<a name="_Toc464196208"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Add a new Device related to a Disk that can beupdated.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DeviceName: Computer name with nospaces. ASCII computer name characters Max Length=15</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid VirtualHostingPoolId: GUID of the VirtualHosting Pool. It is not used with VirtualHostingPoolName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string VirtualHostingPoolName: Name of the VirtualHosting Pool.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk Locator toupdate with this Device.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsPhysicalAddress DeviceMac: Ethernet address canhave the form XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX. Uniquely identifies the Device.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Port: UDP port to use with Stream Service.Min=1025, Max=65534, Default=6901</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdTimestamp: The time the Active Directory machineaccount password was generated. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdSignature: The signature of the ActiveDirectory machine account password. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogLevel: Level to perform logging at. Valuesare: 0 (None), 1 (Fatal), 2 (Error), 3 (Warning), 4 (Info), 5 (Debug), and 6(Trace). Min=0, Max=6, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainName: Fully qualified name of thedomain that the Device belongs to. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainObjectSID: The value of the objectSIDAD attribute of the same name for the Device's computer account. Do not setthis field, it is only set internally by PVS. Default="" MaxLength=186</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DomainControllerName: The name of the DC usedto create the host's computer account. Do not set this field, it is only setinternally by PVS. Default="" Max Length=4000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime DomainTimeCreated: The time that thecomputer account was created. Has the date and time including milliseconds. Donot set this field, it is only set internally by PVS. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDiskUpdateDevice: If successful, the newPvsDiskUpdateDevice object is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsDiskUpdateDevice with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDiskUpdateDevice named theDevice forthe DiskLocatorId 2888f183-2f48-4771-b8dd-e5a44b2ee59b.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDiskUpdateDevice -Name theDevice -DeviceMac"00-11-22-33-44-55" -VirtualHostingPoolName theVirtualHostingPool-DiskLocatorId "2888f183-2f48-4771-b8dd-e5a44b2ee59b"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsDiskUpdateDevice with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsDiskUpdateDevice named theDevice forthe DiskLocatorId 2888f183-2f48-4771-b8dd-e5a44b2ee59b with all fields setdifferent than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsDiskUpdateDevice -Name theDevice -DeviceMac"00-11-22-33-44-55" -VirtualHostingPoolName theVirtualHostingPool-DiskLocatorId "2888f183-2f48-4771-b8dd-e5a44b2ee59b" -Description"DiskUpdate Device" -Port 6000 -LogLevel 3</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Do not set AdTimestamp, AdSignature, DomainName,DomainObjectSID, DomainControllerName and DomainTimeCreated. They are only setinternally by PVS.</span></p>
##New-PvsFarmView<a name="_Toc464196209"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new View for the Farm.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or FarmViewName: name of the Farm View. MaxLength=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to have confirmationwithout the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsFarmView: If successful, the new PvsFarmViewobject is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsFarmView with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsFarmView named theFarmView.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsFarmView -Name theFarmView</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsFarmView with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsFarmView named theFarmView with"XenServer FarmView" as the description.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsFarmView -Name theFarmView -Description"XenServer FarmView"</span></p>
##New-PvsServer<a name="_Toc464196210"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Add a new Server to a Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or ServerName: Computer name with nospaces. ASCII computer name characters Max Length=21</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site this Server is to be amember of. It is not used with SiteName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site this Server is tobe a member of. It is not used with SiteId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdMaxPasswordAge: Number of days before apassword expires. Min=1, Max=30, Default=7</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LicenseTimeout: Amount of seconds before alicense times out. Min=15, Max=300, Default=30</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint VDiskCreatePacing: VDisk create time pacing inmiliseconds. Min=0, Max=5, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint FirstPort: Number of the first UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LastPort: Number of the last UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6930</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ThreadsPerPort: Number of worker threads per IOport. Required that (threadPerPort * numberPorts * numberIPs) <= 1000.Min=1, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BuffersPerThread: Number of buffers per workerthread. Min=1, Max=128, Default=24</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ServerCacheTimeout: Number of seconds to waitbefore considering another Server is down. Min=5, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint IoBurstSize: Number of bytes read/writes cansend in a burst of packets. Required thatIoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=4096, Max=61440,Default=32768</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransmissionUnits: Ethernet maximumtransmission unit size for the protocol for use for Server and Device. Requiredthat IoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=502, Max=16426,Default=1506</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootDevicesAllowed: Maximum number ofDevices allowed to boot simultaneously. Min=1, Max=1000, Default=500</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootSeconds: Maximum number of seconds for aDevice to boot. Min=10, Max=900, Default=60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BootPauseSeconds: Number of seconds that aDevice will pause during login if its server busy. Min=1, Max=60, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter AdMaxPasswordAgeEnabled: If-AdMaxPasswordAgeEnabled is specified, Age the password.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter EventLoggingEnabled: If-EventLoggingEnabled is specified, event logging is enabled.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter NonBlockingIoDisabled: If-NonBlockingIoDisabled is specified, do not use non-Blocking IO.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Ip: One or more streaming ip addresses.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialQueryConnectionPoolSize: Initial size ofdatabase connection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000, Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Initialsize of database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000,Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxQueryConnectionPoolSize: Maximum size ofdatabase connection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767,Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Maximum sizeof database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767,Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RefreshInterval: Interval, in number ofseconds, the server should wait before refreshing settings. If set to 0, unuseddatabase connections are never released. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint UnusedDbConnectionTimeout: Interval, in numberof seconds, a connection should go unused before it is to be released. Min=0,Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryCount: Number of times afailed database connection will be retried. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=2</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryInterval: Interval, innumber of milliseconds, the server should wait before retrying to connect to adatabase. Min=0, Max=10000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LocalConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are local. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RemoteConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are remote. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string RamDiskIpAddress: IP address to use fortransferring the RAM Disk. When equal to 0.0.0.0 the server IP is used with thefirst part replaced with 233. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskTimeToLive: Time to live for theinvitation packet sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=255, Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter RamDiskInvitationVariable: If-RamDiskInvitationVariable is specified, the Invitation Type is Variable. Bydefault it is Fixed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskInvitationPeriod: The amount of time inseconds that invitations are sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=300, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogLevel: Level to perform logging at. Valuesare: 0 (None), 1 (Fatal), 2 (Error), 3 (Warning), 4 (Info), 5 (Debug), and 6(Trace). Min=0, Max=6, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileSizeMax: Maximum size log files canreach in Megabytes. Min=1, Max=50, Default=5</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileBackupCopiesMax: Maximum number of logfile backups. Min=1, Max=50, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">float PowerRating: A strictly relative rating ofthis Server's capabilities when compared to other Servers in the Store(s) itbelongs too; can be used to help tune load balancing. Min=0.1, Max=1000,Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastCeipUploadAttempt: Time that thisserver last attempted a CEIP upload. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastBugReportAttempt: Time that this serverlast attempted to upload or generate a bug report bundle. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportStatus: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportResult: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=4000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportSummary: Summary of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of this operationis "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will be confirmed.$ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to have confirmation withoutthe Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsServer: If successful, the new PvsServer objectis returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsServer with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsServer named theServer in theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsServer -Name theServer -SiteName theSite -Ip192.168.0.33 192.168.0.34</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsServer with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsServer named theServer in theSite withall fields set different than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsServer -Name theServer -SiteName theSite -Ip192.168.0.33 192.168.0.34 -Description "XenServer Server"-AdMaxPasswordAge 10 -LicenseTimeout 60 -VDiskCreatePacing 5 -FirstPort 7910-LastPort 7930 -ThreadsPerPort 16 -BuffersPerThread 48 -ServerCacheTimeout 15-IoBurstSize 13632 -MaxTransmissionUnits 502 -MaxBootDevicesAllowed 1000-MaxBootSeconds 120 -BootPauseSeconds 20 -AdMaxPasswordAgeEnabled-EventLoggingEnabled -NonBlockingIoDisabled -InitialQueryConnectionPoolSize 100-InitialTransactionConnectionPoolSize 100 -MaxQueryConnectionPoolSize 2000-MaxTransactionConnectionPoolSize 2000 -RefreshInterval 500-UnusedDbConnectionTimeout 500 -BusyDbConnectionRetryCount 5-BusyDbConnectionRetryInterval 50 -LocalConcurrentIoLimit 5-RemoteConcurrentIoLimit 5 -RamDiskIpAddress 192.168.5.5 -RamDiskTimeToLive 2-RamDiskInvitationVariable -RamDiskInvitationPeriod 20 -LogLevel 3-LogFileSizeMax 10 -LogFileBackupCopiesMax 5 -PowerRating 1.5</span></p>
##New-PvsSite<a name="_Toc464196211"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new Site for the Farm.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or SiteName: Name of the Site. MaxLength=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InventoryFilePollingInterval: The number ofseconds between polls for Disk changes in the Stores. Min=1, Max=600,Default=60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter EnableDiskUpdate: If-EnableDiskUpdate is specified, the Disk Update will be enabled for the Site.By default Disk Update is disabled.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DiskUpdateServerId: GUID of the Disk UpdateServer for the Site. Not used with DiskUpdateServerName.Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DiskUpdateServerName: Name of the Disk UpdateServer for the Site. Not used with DiskUpdateServerId. Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string MakUser: User name used for MAK activation.Default="" Max Length=64</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string MakPassword: User password used for MAKactivation. Default="" Max Length=64</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsSite: If successful, the new PvsSite object isreturned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsSite with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsSite named theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsSite -Name theSite</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsSite with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsSite named theSite with all fields setdifferent than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsSite -Name theSite -Description"XenServer Site" -InventoryFilePollingInterval 100 -EnableDiskUpdate-DiskUpdateServerName theServer -MakUser theMakUser -MakPassword theMakPassword</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Create PvsSite and Assign AuthGroup to it
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsSite named theSite and AssignsAuthGroup "AD\PVSSiteAdminGroup" to it.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsSite -Name theSite | Grant-PvsAuthGroup-AuthGroupName "AD\PVSSiteAdminGroup"</span></p>
##New-PvsSiteView<a name="_Toc464196212"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new View for a Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or SiteViewName: Name of the Site View.Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site this View is to be amember of. It is not used with SiteName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site this View is to bea member of. It is not used with SiteId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsSiteView: If successful, the new PvsSiteViewobject is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsSiteView with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsSiteView named theSiteView in theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsSiteView -Name theSiteView -SiteName theSite</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsSiteView with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsSiteView named theSiteView in theSitewith "XenServer SiteView" as the description.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsSiteView -Name theSiteView -SiteName theSite-Description "XenServer SiteView"</span></p>
##New-PvsStore<a name="_Toc464196213"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new Store for the Farm.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or StoreName: Name of the Store. MaxLength=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site where Administratorsof that Site can change this Store. Not used for Farm Stores. SiteName can beused instead. Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site whereAdministrators of that Site can change this Store. Not used for Farm Stores.SiteId can be used instead. Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Path: Default directory path that the Serversuse to access this Store. Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] CachePath: Default Cache path(s) that theServers use with this Store. If none are specified the caches will be placed inthe WriteCache subdirectory of the Store path. Default=None</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsStore: If successful, the new PvsStore object isreturned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsStore with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsStore named theStore with network sharepath.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsStore -Name theStore -Path"\\thePath\subDirectory"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsStore with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsStore named theStore that only theSiteadministrators can change with all fields set different than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsStore -Name theStore -Path"c:\thePath" -SiteName theSite -Description "Local Server PathStore" -CachePath "c:\thePath\sub1" "c:\thePath\sub2"</span></p>
##New-PvsUpdateTask<a name="_Toc464196214"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a new Update Task for a Store.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or UpdateTaskName: Name of the UpdateTask. It is unique within the Site. Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site that this Update Taskis a member of. It is not used with SiteName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site that this UpdateTask is a member of. It is not used with SiteId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description. Default=""Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Disabled: If -Disabled is specified,the updates will not be processed. By default the updates will be processed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Hour: The hour of the day to perform the task.Min=0, Max=23, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Minute: The minute of the hour to perform thetask. Min=0, Max=59, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Recurrence: The update will reoccur on thisschedule. 0 = None, 1 = Daily, 2 = Every Weekday, 3 = Weekly, 4 = Monthly Date,5 = Monthly Type. Min=0, Max=5, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint DayMask: Days selected values. 1 = Monday, 2 =Tuesday, 4 = Wednesday, 8 = Thursday, 16 = Friday, 32 = Saturday, 64 = Sunday,128 = Day. Default=0. This is used with Weekly and Monthly Type recurrence.Min=1, Max=255, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint[] Date: Days of the month. Numbers from 1-31are the only valid values. This is used with Monthly Date recurrence.Default="" Max Length=83</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MonthlyOffset: When to happen monthly. 0 =None, 1 = First, 2 = Second, 3 = Third, 4 = Forth, 5 = Last. This is used withMonthly Type recurrence. Min=0, Max=5, Default=3</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string EsdType: Esd to use. Valid values are SCCM orWSUS. If no value, a custom script is run on the client. Default=""Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string PreUpdateScript: Script file to run beforethe update starts. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string PreVmScript: Script file to run before the VMis loaded. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string PostUpdateScript: Script file to run afterthe update finishes. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string PostVmScript: Script file to run after the VMis unloaded. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Domain: Domain to add the Disk UpdateDevice(s) to. If not included, the first Domain Controller found on the Serveris used. Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string OrganizationUnit: Organizational Unit to addthe Disk Update Device(s) to. This parameter is optional. If it is notspecified, the device is added to the built in Computers container. Child OU'sshould be delimited with forward slashes, e.g. "ParentOU/ChildOU".Special characters in an OU name, such as '"', '#', '+', ',', ';', '>','=', must be escaped with a backslash. For example, an OU called"commaIn,TheMiddle" must be specified as"commaIn\,TheMiddle". The old syntax of delimiting child OU's with acomma is still supported, but deprecated. Note that in this case, the child OUcomes first, e.g. "ChildOU,ParentOU". Default="" MaxLength=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint PostUpdateApprove: Access to place the versionin after the update has occurred. 0 = Production, 1 = Test, 2 = Maintenance.Min=0, Max=2, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of this operationis "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will be confirmed.$ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to have confirmation withoutthe Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsUpdateTask: If successful, the new PvsUpdateTaskobject is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsUpdateTask with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite. Since no EsdType is set, the update.bat in the client installdirectory will be executed for this task.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsUpdateTask for Daily Updates
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite for SCCM that occurs every day at midnight.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite -Description "Every day at Midnight" -Recurrence 1 -Hour 0-Minute 0 -EsdType SCCM</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Create PvsUpdateTask for Weekday Updates
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite for WSUS that occurs every weekday at midnight.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite -Description "Every weekday at Midnight" -Recurrence 2 -Hour0 -Minute 0 -EsdType WSUS</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Create PvsUpdateTask for Weekly Updates
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite for SCCM that occurs every week on Monday and Friday at 3 AM.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite -Description "Every week on Monday and Friday at 3 AM"-Recurrence 3 -Hour 3 -Minute 0 -DayMask 17 -EsdType SCCM</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 5: Create PvsUpdateTask for Monthly Updates
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite for WSUS that occurs every month on the 1st and 15th at midnight.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite -Description "Every month on the 1st and 15th at Midnight"-Recurrence 4 -Hour 0 -Minute 0 -Date 1 15 -EsdType WSUS</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 6: Create PvsUpdateTask for Monthly Type Updates
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask intheSite for SCCM that is disabled and occurs every month on the 2nd Tuesday andThusday at Midnight.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteName theSite-Description "Every month on the 2nd Tuesday and Thusday at Midnight"-Disabled -Recurrence 5 -Hour 0 -Minute 0 -DayMask 10 -MonthlyOffset 2 -EsdTypeSCCM</span></p>
##New-PvsVirtualHostingPool<a name="_Toc464196215"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Add a new Virtual Hosting Pool to a Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">All parameters that do not have a Default arerequired, unless only a few of a group are required.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or VirtualHostingPoolName: Name of theVirtual Hosting Pool. It is unique within the Site. Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site that this VirtualHosting Pool is a member of. It is not used with SiteName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site that this VirtualHosting Pool is a member of. It is not used with SiteId.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Type: Type of the Virtual Hosting Pool. 0 =Citrix XenServer, 1 = Microsoft SCVMM/Hyper-V, 2 = VMWare vSphere/ESX. Min=0,Max=2, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Server: Name or IP of the Host Server. MaxLength=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Port: Port of the Host Server. Min=80,Max=65534, Default=80</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Datacenter: Datacenter of the Virtual HostingPool. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint UpdateLimit: Number of updates at the sametime. Min=2, Max=1000, Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint UpdateTimeout: Timeout for updates. Min=2,Max=240, Default=60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ShutdownTimeout: Timeout for shutdown. Min=2,Max=30, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string UserName: Name to use when logging into theServer.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Password: Password to use when logging intothe Server.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid XdHostingUnitUuid: UUID of XenDesktop HostingUnit Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter XsPvsProxyEnabled: Enable XenServerPVS proxy when set to true Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PrepopulateEnabled: Enableprepopulate when set to true Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid XsPvsSiteUuid: UUID of XenServerPVS_site  Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsVirtualHostingPool: If successful, the newPvsVirtualHostingPool object is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Create PvsVirtualHostingPool with Minimum Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsVirtualHostingPool namedtheVirtualHostingPool in theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsVirtualHostingPool -NametheVirtualHostingPool -SiteName theSite -Server 192.168.0.33 -UserNametheUserName -Password thePassword</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Create PvsVirtualHostingPool with All Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Creates a PvsVirtualHostingPool namedtheVirtualHostingPool in theSite with all fields set different than defaults.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">New-PvsVirtualHostingPool -NametheVirtualHostingPool -SiteName theSite -Server 192.168.0.33 -UserNametheUserName -Password thePassword -Type 1 -Description "AVirtualHostingPool" -Port 180 -Datacenter Data -UpperLimit 500-UpdateTimeout 120 -ShutdownTimeout 20</span></p>
##Remove-PvsAuthGroup<a name="_Toc464196216"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Remove one or more AuthGroup Active Directory orWindows Group names.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or AuthGroupId: GUID of the AuthGroup toDelete.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or AuthGroupName: Name of theAuthGroup to Delete.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Force: If -Force is specified, theAuthGroup will be Deleted even if being used, otherwise an error is returned ifbeing used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or UpdateTaskId: GUID of the Update Taskto Delete.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this required ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or UpdateTaskName: Name of the UpdateTask to Delete.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">UpdateTaskId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "medium". If -Confirm is specified, the operation willbe confirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "medium" or"low" to have confirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Remove the PvsUpdateTask with Name theUpdateTask
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This example removes the PvsUpdateTask namedtheUpdateTask in the Site named theSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Remove-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Remove the PvsUpdateTask with Name theUpdateTask using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This example uses Get-PvsUpdateTask that returns thePvsUpdateTask named theUpdateTask in the Site named theSite that is piped toRemove-PvsUpdateTask for removal.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsUpdateTask -Name theUpdateTask -SiteNametheSite | Remove-PvsUpdateTask</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>

##Reset-PvsDeviceForDomain<a name="_Toc464196237"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Reset a Device, all Devices in a Collection or Viewfor a Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or DeviceId: GUID of the Device to Resetfor the Domain.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] CollectionId: GUID of the Collection to Resetall Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] SiteViewId: GUID of the Site View to Resetall Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] FarmViewId: GUID of the Farm View to Resetall Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] FarmViewName: Name of the Farm View toReset all Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or one of these required ; resolutions</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] CollectionName: Name of the Collection toReset all Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] SiteViewName: Name of the Site View toReset all Devices for the Domain.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Domain: Domain to Reset the Device(s) for.If not included, the first Domain Controller found on the Server is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] OrganizationUnit: Organizational Unit toreset the Device(s) to. This parameter is optional. If it is not specified, theaccount remains in its existing OU. Child OU's should be delimited with forwardslashes, e.g. "ParentOU/ChildOU". Special characters in an OU name,such as '"', '#', '+', ',', ';', '>', '=', must be escaped with abackslash. For example, an OU called "commaIn,TheMiddle" must bespecified as "commaIn\,TheMiddle". The old syntax of delimiting childOU's with a comma is still supported, but deprecated. Note that in this case,the child OU comes first, e.g. "ChildOU,ParentOU".</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DeviceId, CollectionId, SiteViewId or FarmViewId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "medium". <p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsDevice output is piped to theReset-PvsDeviceForDomain.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsFarmView output is piped to theReset-PvsDeviceForDomain.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or ServerName: Name of the Server torestart the Stream Service.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] SiteId: GUID of the Site to restart theStream Service on all Servers.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] SiteName: Name of the Site to restart theStream Service on all Servers.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">ServerId or SiteId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "medium". If -Confirm is specified, the operation willbe confirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "medium" or"low" to have confirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Restart-PvsStreamService for Name
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Restart-PvsStreamService -Name theServer</span></p>
