####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsDisk for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDisk into a $o variable. Change the $ofield values and then Set the PvsDisk with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsDisk -DiskLocatorId "81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf"-Fields PrinterManagementEnabled</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.PrinterManagementEnabled = $false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsDisk $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsDisk for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDisk into a $o variable. Change a $ofield to the correct value and then Set the PvsDisk with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDisk -DiskLocatorId"81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf" -FieldsPrinterManagementEnabled | foreach { $o = $_; $o.PrinterManagementEnabled =$false; $o } | Set-PvsDisk</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsDiskLocator<a name="_Toc464196249"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set Disk Locator(s) changed values fromPvsDiskLocator object(s), or set one or more field values for a PvsDiskLocator.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDiskLocator DiskLocator: PvsDiskLocator object(s)with changed property value(s) to be set. The object(s) can come from apileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsDiskLocator object, andonly will be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description. Default=""Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string MenuText: Text that is displayed in the BootMenu. If this field has no value, the name value is used. Default=""ASCII Max Length=64</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid ServerId: GUID of the single Server that thisDisk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerName.Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string ServerName: Name of the single Server thatthis Disk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerId.Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Enabled: True when this disk can be booted,false otherwise. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool RebalanceEnabled: True when this Server canautomatically rebalance Devices, false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RebalanceTriggerPercent: Percent over fair loadthat triggers a dynamic Device rebalance. Min=5, Max=5000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint SubnetAffinity: Qualifier for subnet affinitywhen assigning a Server. 0=None, 1=Best Effort, 2=Fixed. Min=0, Max=2,Default=0</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When DiskLocator is not passed, the parameters beloware used:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk Locatorto Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this required ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator File to Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that is needed whena DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string MenuText: Text that is displayed in the BootMenu. If this field has no value, the name value is used. Default=""ASCII Max Length=64</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid ServerId: GUID of the single Server that thisDisk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerName. Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string ServerName: Name of the single Server thatthis Disk Locator is assigned to. It is not used with ServerId.Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Enabled: True when this disk can be booted,false otherwise. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool RebalanceEnabled: True when this Server canautomatically rebalance Devices, false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RebalanceTriggerPercent: Percent over fair loadthat triggers a dynamic Device rebalance. Min=5, Max=5000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint SubnetAffinity: Qualifier for subnet affinitywhen assigning a Server. 0=None, 1=Best Effort, 2=Fixed. Min=0, Max=2,Default=0</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsDiskLocator object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsDiskLocator for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDiskLocator into a $o variable. Changethe $o field values and then Set the PvsDiskLocator with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsDiskLocator -DiskLocatorId"81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf" -Fields RebalanceEnabled</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.RebalanceEnabled = $true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsDiskLocator $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsDiskLocator for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDiskLocator into a $o variable. Change a$o field to the correct value and then Set the PvsDiskLocator with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskLocator -DiskLocatorId"81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf" -Fields RebalanceEnabled |foreach { $o = $_; $o.RebalanceEnabled = $true; $o } | Set-PvsDiskLocator</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Get PvsDiskLocator and Enable
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get all PvsDiskLocator that are not Enabled and thenEnables them.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskLocator -Fields Enabled | Where-Object{$_.Enabled -eq $false} | foreach { $o = $_; $o.Enabled = $true; $o } |Set-PvsDiskLocator</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set Disk Version(s) changed values fromPvsDiskVersion object(s), or set one or more field values for a PvsDiskVersion.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime ScheduledDate: Date/Time that the DiskVersion is scheduled to become available. Has the date, hour and minute. Emptywhen the disk version is made available immediately. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When DiskVersion is not passed, the parameters beloware used:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk LocatorVersion to Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this required ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator Version to Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Version: Version to Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that is needed whena DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime ScheduledDate: Date/Time that the DiskVersion is scheduled to become available. Has the date, hour and minute. Emptywhen the disk version is made available immediately. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsDiskVersion object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsDiskVersion for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDiskVersion into a $o variable. Changethe $o field values and then Set the PvsDiskVersion with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsDiskVersion -DiskLocatorId"81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf" -Version 5 -FieldsScheduledDate</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.ScheduledDate = "2016/01/01"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsDiskVersion $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsDiskVersion for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsDiskVersion into a $o variable. Change a$o field to the correct value and then Set the PvsDiskVersion with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskVersion -DiskLocatorId"81ea9077-598d-459f-a443-71fabd1840bf" -Version 5 -FieldsScheduledDate | foreach { $o = $_; $o.ScheduledDate = "2016/01/01";$o } | Set-PvsDiskVersion</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsFarm<a name="_Toc464196252"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set Farm changed values from a PvsFarm object, orset one or more field values for a PvsFarm.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsFarm Farm: PvsFarm object with changed propertyvalue(s) to be set. The object can come from a pileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsFarm object, and onlywill be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or FarmName: Name of the Farm.Default="" Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description. Default=""Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AutoAddEnabled: True when Auto Add is enabled,false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AuditingEnabled: True when Auditing is enabled,false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastAuditArchiveDate: Last date of AuditTrail data that was Archived. Has the date. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DefaultSiteId: GUID of the Site to place newDevices into automatically. Not used with defaultSiteName.Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DefaultSiteName: Name of the Site to placenew Devices into automatically. Not used with DefaultSiteId.Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool OfflineDatabaseSupportEnabled: True whenOffline Database Support is enabled, false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LicenseServer: License server name.Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LicenseServerPort: License server port.Min=1025, Max=65534, Default=27000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AutomaticMergeEnabled: True when AutomaticMerge is enabled, false otherwise. If the number of versions becomes more thanthe MaxVersions value, a merge will occur at the end of PromoteDiskVersion.Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxVersions: Maximum number a versions of aDisk that can exist before a merge will automatically occur. Min=3, Max=50,Default=5</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MergeMode: Mode to place the version in after amerge has occurred. Values are: 0 (Production), 1 (Test) and 2 (Maintenance).Min=0, Max=2, Default=2</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When Farm is not passed, the parameters below areused:</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or FarmId: GUID of the Farm to Set. Thisis optional since there is only one Farm.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string NewName: Name of the Farm.Default="" Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AutoAddEnabled: True when Auto Add is enabled,false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AuditingEnabled: True when Auditing is enabled,false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastAuditArchiveDate: Last date of AuditTrail data that was Archived. Has the date. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DefaultSiteId: GUID of the Site to place newDevices into automatically. Not used with defaultSiteName. Default=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DefaultSiteName: Name of the Site to placenew Devices into automatically. Not used with DefaultSiteId.Default=""</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool OfflineDatabaseSupportEnabled: True whenOffline Database Support is enabled, false otherwise. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LicenseServer: License server name.Default="" Max Length=255</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LicenseServerPort: License server port.Min=1025, Max=65534, Default=27000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AutomaticMergeEnabled: True when AutomaticMerge is enabled, false otherwise. If the number of versions becomes more thanthe MaxVersions value, a merge will occur at the end of PromoteDiskVersion.Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxVersions: Maximum number a versions of aDisk that can exist before a merge will automatically occur. Min=3, Max=50,Default=5</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MergeMode: Mode to place the version in after amerge has occurred. Values are: 0 (Production), 1 (Test) and 2 (Maintenance).Min=0, Max=2, Default=2</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsFarm object is returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsFarm for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsFarm into a $o variable. Change the $ofield values and then Set the PvsFarm with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsFarm -Fields AuditingEnabled,OfflineDatabaseSupportEnabled</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.AuditingEnabled = $true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.OfflineDatabaseSupportEnabled = $true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsFarm $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsFarm for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsFarm into a $o variable for the fieldthat has the wrong value. Change the $o field to the correct value and then Setthe PvsFarm with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsFarm -Fields AuditingEnabled | Where-Object{$_.AuditingEnabled -ne $true} | foreach { $o = $_; $o.AuditingEnabled = $true;$o } | Set-PvsFarm</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsFarmView<a name="_Toc464196253"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set Farm View(s) changed values from PvsFarmViewobject(s), or set one or more field values for a PvsFarmView.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsFarmView FarmView: PvsFarmView object(s) withchanged property value(s) to be set. The object(s) can come from a pileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsFarmView object, and onlywill be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or FarmViewName: name of the Farm View.Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When FarmView is not passed, the parameters beloware used:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or FarmViewId: GUID of the Farm View toSet.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or FarmViewName: Name of the Farm Viewto Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string NewName: name of the Farm View. Max Length=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsFarmView object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsFarmView for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsFarmView into a $o variable. Change the$o field values and then Set the PvsFarmView with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsFarmView -Name oldFarmView -Fields Name</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.Name = "newFarmView"</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsFarmView for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsFarmView into a $o variable. Change a $ofield to the correct value and then Set the PvsFarmView with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsFarmView -Name oldFarmView -Fields Name |foreach { $o = $_; $o.Name = "newFarmView"; $o } | Set-PvsFarmView</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsOverrideVersion<a name="_Toc464196254"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Specify a Disk Version all Production Devices willboot from.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or DiskLocatorId: GUID of the DiskLocator File to Override the Production Version for.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this required ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator File to Override the Production Version for.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Version: Version to set as the OverrideProduction Version. If Version is not included and if there is an OverrideProduction Version, then no longer have it as the Override Version.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] StoreId: GUID of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DiskLocatorId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to have confirmationwithout the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set-PvsOverrideVersion for Name with Version
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsOverrideVersion -Name theDiskLocator-SiteName theSite -StoreName theStore -Version 4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set-PvsOverrideVersion for PvsDiskLocator Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsDiskLocator output is piped to theSet-PvsOverrideVersion.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskLocator -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore -Fields Guid | Set-PvsOverrideVersion -Version 4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Set-PvsOverrideVersion for Name
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsOverrideVersion -Name theDiskLocator-SiteName theSite -StoreName theStore</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Set-PvsOverrideVersion for PvsDiskLocator Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsDiskLocator output is piped to theSet-PvsOverrideVersion.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskLocator -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore -Fields Guid | Set-PvsOverrideVersion</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
##Set-PvsServer<a name="_Toc464196255"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set Server(s) changed values from PvsServerobject(s), or set one or more field values for a PvsServer. Restart theServer(s) after setting.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsServer Server: PvsServer object(s) with changedproperty value(s) to be set. The object(s) can come from a pileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsServer object, and onlywill be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or ServerName: Computer name with nospaces. ASCII computer name characters Max Length=21</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdMaxPasswordAge: Number of days before apassword expires. Min=1, Max=30, Default=7</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LicenseTimeout: Amount of seconds before alicense times out. Min=15, Max=300, Default=30</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint VDiskCreatePacing: VDisk create time pacing inmiliseconds. Min=0, Max=5, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint FirstPort: Number of the first UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LastPort: Number of the last UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6930</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ThreadsPerPort: Number of worker threads per IOport. Required that (threadPerPort * numberPorts * numberIPs) <= 1000.Min=1, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BuffersPerThread: Number of buffers per workerthread. Min=1, Max=128, Default=24</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ServerCacheTimeout: Number of seconds to waitbefore considering another Server is down. Min=5, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint IoBurstSize: Number of bytes read/writes cansend in a burst of packets. Required thatIoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=4096, Max=61440,Default=32768</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransmissionUnits: Ethernet maximumtransmission unit size for the protocol for use for Server and Device. Requiredthat IoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=502, Max=16426,Default=1506</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootDevicesAllowed: Maximum number ofDevices allowed to boot simultaneously. Min=1, Max=1000, Default=500</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootSeconds: Maximum number of seconds for aDevice to boot. Min=10, Max=900, Default=60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BootPauseSeconds: Number of seconds that aDevice will pause during login if its server busy. Min=1, Max=60, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AdMaxPasswordAgeEnabled: Age the password, whenset to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool EventLoggingEnabled: Enable event logging, whenset to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool NonBlockingIoEnabled: Use non-Blocking IO, whenset to true. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Ip: One or more streaming ip addresses.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialQueryConnectionPoolSize: Initial size ofdatabase connection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000,Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Initialsize of database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000,Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxQueryConnectionPoolSize: Maximum size ofdatabase connection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767,Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Maximum sizeof database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767,Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RefreshInterval: Interval, in number ofseconds, the server should wait before refreshing settings. If set to 0, unuseddatabase connections are never released. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint UnusedDbConnectionTimeout: Interval, in numberof seconds, a connection should go unused before it is to be released. Min=0,Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryCount: Number of times afailed database connection will be retried. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=2</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryInterval: Interval, innumber of milliseconds, the server should wait before retrying to connect to adatabase. Min=0, Max=10000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LocalConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are local. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RemoteConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are remote. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string RamDiskIpAddress: IP address to use fortransferring the RAM Disk. When equal to 0.0.0.0 the server IP is used with thefirst part replaced with 233. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskTimeToLive: Time to live for theinvitation packet sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=255, Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool RamDiskInvitationType: Either false for Fixed,or true for Variable. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskInvitationPeriod: The amount of time inseconds that invitations are sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=300, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogLevel: Level to perform logging at. Valuesare: 0 (None), 1 (Fatal), 2 (Error), 3 (Warning), 4 (Info), 5 (Debug), and 6 (Trace).Min=0, Max=6, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileSizeMax: Maximum size log files canreach in Megabytes. Min=1, Max=50, Default=5</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileBackupCopiesMax: Maximum number of logfile backups. Min=1, Max=50, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">float PowerRating: A strictly relative rating ofthis Server's capabilities when compared to other Servers in the Store(s) itbelongs too; can be used to help tune load balancing. Min=0.1, Max=1000,Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastCeipUploadAttempt: Time that thisserver last attempted a CEIP upload. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastBugReportAttempt: Time that this serverlast attempted to upload or generate a bug report bundle. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportStatus: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportResult: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=4000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportSummary: Summary of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When Server is not passed, the parameters below areused:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or ServerId: GUID of the Server to Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or ServerName: Name of the Server toSet.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string NewName: Computer name with no spaces. ASCIIcomputer name characters Max Length=21</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: User description.Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint AdMaxPasswordAge: Number of days before apassword expires. Min=1, Max=30, Default=7</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LicenseTimeout: Amount of seconds before alicense times out. Min=15, Max=300, Default=30</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint VDiskCreatePacing: VDisk create time pacing inmiliseconds. Min=0, Max=5, Default=0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint FirstPort: Number of the first UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LastPort: Number of the last UDP port for useby the Stream Service, First and Last must allow at least 5 ports. Min=1025,Max=65534, Default=6930</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ThreadsPerPort: Number of worker threads per IOport. Required that (threadPerPort * numberPorts * numberIPs) <= 1000.Min=1, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BuffersPerThread: Number of buffers per workerthread. Min=1, Max=128, Default=24</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint ServerCacheTimeout: Number of seconds to waitbefore considering another Server is down. Min=5, Max=60, Default=8</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint IoBurstSize: Number of bytes read/writes cansend in a burst of packets. Required thatIoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=4096, Max=61440,Default=32768</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransmissionUnits: Ethernet maximumtransmission unit size for the protocol for use for Server and Device. Requiredthat IoBurstSize/(MaxTransmissionUnits-76)<=32. Min=502, Max=16426,Default=1506</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootDevicesAllowed: Maximum number ofDevices allowed to boot simultaneously. Min=1, Max=1000, Default=500</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxBootSeconds: Maximum number of seconds for aDevice to boot. Min=10, Max=900, Default=60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BootPauseSeconds: Number of seconds that aDevice will pause during login if its server busy. Min=1, Max=60, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool AdMaxPasswordAgeEnabled: Age the password, whenset to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool EventLoggingEnabled: Enable event logging, whenset to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool NonBlockingIoEnabled: Use non-Blocking IO, whenset to true. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Ip: One or more streaming ip addresses.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialQueryConnectionPoolSize: Initial size ofdatabase connection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000,Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint InitialTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Initialsize of database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=1000,Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxQueryConnectionPoolSize: Maximum size of databaseconnection pool for non-transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767, Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint MaxTransactionConnectionPoolSize: Maximum sizeof database connection pool for transactional queries. Min=1, Max=32767,Default=1000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RefreshInterval: Interval, in number ofseconds, the server should wait before refreshing settings. If set to 0, unuseddatabase connections are never released. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint UnusedDbConnectionTimeout: Interval, in numberof seconds, a connection should go unused before it is to be released. Min=0,Max=32767, Default=300</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryCount: Number of times afailed database connection will be retried. Min=0, Max=32767, Default=2</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint BusyDbConnectionRetryInterval: Interval, innumber of milliseconds, the server should wait before retrying to connect to adatabase. Min=0, Max=10000, Default=25</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LocalConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are local. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RemoteConcurrentIoLimit: Maximum concurrent IOtransactions it performs for vDisks that are remote. A value of 0 disables thefeature. Min=0, Max=128, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string RamDiskIpAddress: IP address to use fortransferring the RAM Disk. When equal to 0.0.0.0 the server IP is used with thefirst part replaced with 233. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskTimeToLive: Time to live for theinvitation packet sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=255, Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool RamDiskInvitationType: Either false for Fixed,or true for Variable. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RamDiskInvitationPeriod: The amount of time inseconds that invitations are sent to Devices. Min=1, Max=300, Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogLevel: Level to perform logging at. Valuesare: 0 (None), 1 (Fatal), 2 (Error), 3 (Warning), 4 (Info), 5 (Debug), and 6(Trace). Min=0, Max=6, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileSizeMax: Maximum size log files canreach in Megabytes. Min=1, Max=50, Default=5</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogFileBackupCopiesMax: Maximum number of logfile backups. Min=1, Max=50, Default=4</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">float PowerRating: A strictly relative rating ofthis Server's capabilities when compared to other Servers in the Store(s) itbelongs too; can be used to help tune load balancing. Min=0.1, Max=1000,Default=1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastCeipUploadAttempt: Time that this serverlast attempted a CEIP upload. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime LastBugReportAttempt: Time that this serverlast attempted to upload or generate a bug report bundle. Default=Empty</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportStatus: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportResult: Status of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=4000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string LastBugReportSummary: Summary of the last bugreport on this server. Default="" Max Length=250</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsServer object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to have confirmationwithout the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsServer for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsServer into a $o variable. Change the $ofield values and then Set the PvsServer with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsServer -Name theServer -FieldsLicenseTimeout, ThreadsPerPort</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.LicenseTimeout = 60</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.ThreadsPerPort = 10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsServer $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsServer for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsServer into a $o variable. Change a $ofield to the correct value and then Set the PvsServer with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsServer -Name theServer -Fields LicenseTimeout| foreach { $o = $_; $o.LicenseTimeout = 60; $o } | Set-PvsServer</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsServerBiosBootstrap<a name="_Toc464196256"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Oem Only: Set Server Bios Bootstrap(s) changedvalues from PvsServerBiosBootstrap object(s), or set one or more field valuesfor a PvsServerBiosBootstrap.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsServerBiosBootstrap ServerBiosBootstrap:PvsServerBiosBootstrap object(s) with changed property value(s) to be set. Theobject(s) can come from a pileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsServerBiosBootstrapobject, and only will be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Enabled: Automatically update the BIOS on thetarget device with these setting when set to true, otherwise do not use thesesettings. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool DhcpEnabled: Use DHCP to retrieve target deviceIP when set to true, otherwise use the static domain, dnsIpAddresstrue anddnsIpAddress2 settings. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Lookup: Use DNS to find the Server when set totrue with the ServerName host value, otherwise use the bootservertrue_Ip,bootservertrue_Port, bootserver2_Ip, bootserver2_Port, bootserver3_Ip,bootserver3_Port, bootserver4_Ip, and bootserver4_Port settings. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool VerboseMode: Display verbose diagnosticinformation when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool InterruptSafeMode: Interrupt safe mode (use iftarget device hangs during boot) when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool PaeMode: PAE mode (use if PAE enabled inboot.ini of target device) when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool BootFromHdOnFail: For network recovery rebootto hard drive when set to true, restore network connection when set to false.Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RecoveryTime: When bootFromHdOnFail is 1, thisis the number of seconds to wait before reboot to hard drive. Min=10,Max=60000, Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint PollingTimeout: Login polling timeout inmilliseconds. Min=1000, Max=60000, Default=5000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint GeneralTimeout: Login general timeout inmilliseconds. Min=1000, Max=60000, Default=5000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or ServerName: Host to use for DNSlookup. Only used when Lookup is true. Default=IMAGESERVER1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver1_Ip: 1st boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver1_Port: 1st boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver2_Ip: 2nd boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver2_Port: 2nd boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver3_Ip: 3rd boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver3_Port: 3rd boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver4_Ip: 4th boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver4_Port: 4th boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Domain: Domain of the primary and secondaryDNS servers. Only used when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DnsIpAddress1: Primary DNS server IP. Onlyused when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DnsIpAddress2: Secondary DNS server IP. Onlyused when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When ServerBiosBootstrap is not passed, theparameters below are used:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or ServerId: GUID of the Server to Set thedell_bios.bin BIOS bootstrap file.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or ServerName: Name of the Server to Setthe dell_bios.bin BIOS bootstrap file.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Enabled: Automatically update the BIOS on thetarget device with these setting when set to true, otherwise do not use thesesettings. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool DhcpEnabled: Use DHCP to retrieve target deviceIP when set to true, otherwise use the static domain, dnsIpAddresstrue anddnsIpAddress2 settings. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool Lookup: Use DNS to find the Server when set totrue with the ServerName host value, otherwise use the bootservertrue_Ip,bootservertrue_Port, bootserver2_Ip, bootserver2_Port, bootserver3_Ip,bootserver3_Port, bootserver4_Ip, and bootserver4_Port settings. Default=true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool VerboseMode: Display verbose diagnosticinformation when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool InterruptSafeMode: Interrupt safe mode (use iftarget device hangs during boot) when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool PaeMode: PAE mode (use if PAE enabled inboot.ini of target device) when set to true. Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">bool BootFromHdOnFail: For network recovery rebootto hard drive when set to true, restore network connection when set to false.Default=false</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint RecoveryTime: When bootFromHdOnFail is 1, thisis the number of seconds to wait before reboot to hard drive. Min=10,Max=60000, Default=50</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint PollingTimeout: Login polling timeout inmilliseconds. Min=1000, Max=60000, Default=5000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint GeneralTimeout: Login general timeout inmilliseconds. Min=1000, Max=60000, Default=5000</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string NewName: Host to use for DNS lookup. Onlyused when Lookup is true. Default=IMAGESERVER1</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver1_Ip: 1st boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver1_Port: 1st boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver2_Ip: 2nd boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver2_Port: 2nd boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver3_Ip: 3rd boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver3_Port: 3rd boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Bootserver4_Ip: 4th boot server IP. Only usedwhen Lookup is false. Default=0.0.0.0</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Bootserver4_Port: 4th boot server port. Onlyused when Lookup is false. Min=1025, Max=65536, Default=6910</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Domain: Domain of the primary and secondaryDNS servers. Only used when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DnsIpAddress1: Primary DNS server IP. Onlyused when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DnsIpAddress2: Secondary DNS server IP. Onlyused when DhcpEnabled is false.</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsServerBiosBootstrap object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsServerBiosBootstrap for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsServerBiosBootstrap into a $o variable.Change the $o field values and then Set the PvsServerBiosBootstrap with theresult.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsServerBiosBootstrap -Name theServer-Fields DhcpEnabled</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.DhcpEnabled = $true</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsServerBiosBootstrap $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsServerBiosBootstrap for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsServerBiosBootstrap into a $o variable.Change a $o field to the correct value and then Set the PvsServerBiosBootstrapwith the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsServerBiosBootstrap -Name theServer -FieldsDhcpEnabled | foreach { $o = $_; $o.DhcpEnabled = $true; $o } |Set-PvsServerBiosBootstrap</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsServerBootstrap<a name="_Toc464196257"></a>
