<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsVirtualHostingPool for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsVirtualHostingPool into a $o variable.Change a $o field to the correct value and then Set the PvsVirtualHostingPoolwith the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsVirtualHostingPool -NametheVirtualHostingPool -SiteName theSite -Fields Port | foreach { $o = $_;$o.Port = 180; $o } | Set-PvsVirtualHostingPool</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Set-PvsXDSite<a name="_Toc464196264"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set XDSite(s) changed values from PvsXDSiteobject(s), or set one or more field values for a PvsXDSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsXDSite XDSite: PvsXDSite object(s) with changedproperty value(s) to be set. The object(s) can come from a pileline.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">These values are in the PvsXDSite object, and onlywill be set if the value has changed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] ConfigServices: XenDesktop Serveraddresses. Max Length=2000</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">When XDSite is not passed, the parameters below areused:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid Guid or XdSiteId: GUID of the XenDesktop Siteto Set.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional field values to set:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] ConfigServices: XenDesktop Serveraddresses. Max Length=2000</span></p>
<p></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter PassThru: If -PassThru is specified,the resulting PvsXDSite object(s) are returned.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Set PvsXDSite for Individual Fields
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsXDSite into a $o variable. Change the $ofield values and then Set the PvsXDSite with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o = Get-PvsXDSite -Guid"27965b92-7034-408c-9910-cfff53f1feec" -Fields ConfigServices</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$o.ConfigServices = "192.168.0.190","192.168.0.191"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set-PvsXDSite $o</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Set PvsXDSite for a Field Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get the PvsXDSite into a $o variable. Change a $ofield to the correct value and then Set the PvsXDSite with the result.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsXDSite -Guid"27965b92-7034-408c-9910-cfff53f1feec" -Fields ConfigServices |foreach { $o = $_; $o.ConfigServices = "192.168.0.190","192.168.0.191"; $o } | Set-PvsXDSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The "foreach { $o = $_; $o.X = Y; $o }"sets the field X to value Y and returns the object again so it can be piped tothe Set command for update.</span></p>
##Start-PvsAutoUpdate<a name="_Toc464196265"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Apply Auto Update for a Server or all Servers in aSite.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or ServerId: GUID of the Server to applyAuto Update.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or ServerName: Name of the Server toapply Auto Update.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] SiteId: GUID of the Site to apply Auto Updateon all Servers.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] SiteName: Name of the Site to apply AutoUpdate on all Servers.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">ServerId or SiteId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsAutoUpdate for Name
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsAutoUpdate -Name theServer</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Start-PvsAutoUpdate for PvsServer Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsServer output is piped to theStart-PvsAutoUpdate.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsServer -Name theServer -Fields -ServerId |Start-PvsAutoUpdate</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Start-PvsAutoUpdate for SiteName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsAutoUpdate -SiteName theSite</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Start-PvsAutoUpdate for PvsSite Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsSite output is piped to theStart-PvsAutoUpdate.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsSite -SiteName theSite -Fields -SiteId |Start-PvsAutoUpdate</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fields specifiedmakes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
##Start-PvsCreateDisk<a name="_Toc464196266"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Create a Disk and the Disk Locator for it. Returnsthe PvsDiskLocator created if finished. If not returned, then callCreateDiskStatus to get the PvsDiskLocator when processing finishes.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name: Name of the Disk file to be created.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">UInt64 Size: Size of the disk in Megabytes for afixed size disk. Maximum size in Megabytes for a dynamically sized disk. Min=1,VHD Max=2088960, VHDX Max=67108864</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that the Disk willbe a member of.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that the Diskwill be a member of.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid ServerId: GUID of the only Server for thisDisk.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string ServerName: Name of the only Server for thisDisk.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: Description of the Disk thatwill be placed in the Disk Locator.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter CreateDiskDisabled: If-CreateDiskDisabled is specified, the Disk will be created disabled. It iscreated Enabled by default.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter VHDX: If -VHDX is specified, VHDXwill be used for the format of the image. VHDX has a Block size of 32 MB. VHDis the default.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Dynamic: If -Dynamic is specified, adynamic VHD that will be created. The default is fixed.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint VhdBlockSize: Block size in KB. For VHD it isonly used with Dynamic type. Tested sizes for VHD are 512, 2048, and 16384. VHDMin=512, Max=16384, Default=2048. For VHDX it is used for all types. Testedsize for VHDX is 32768. VHDX Min=1024, Max= 262144, Default=32768.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint LogicalSectorSize: Only used with VHDX format.Logical Sector Size. Values are: 512, 4096, Default=512</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">StoreId, SiteId or ServerId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsDiskLocator: If the create is already finishedand successful, the PvsDiskLocator is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsCreateDisk for VHDX to PvsDiskLocator
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This example creates a Dynamic VHDX Disk that has asize of 20 GB.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskLocator = Start-PvsCreateDisk -NametheDiskName -Size 20480 -StoreName theStore -SiteName theSite -VHDX -Dynamic</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">while ($thePvsDiskLocator -eq$null)                           #while the create is processing</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished = Get-PvsCreateDiskStatus -NametheDiskName -StoreName theStore  # get percent finished orDiskLocator when done</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if (%percentFinished.GetType().Name =="PvsDiskLocator")</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskLocator = %percentFinished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished.ToString() + "%finished"                 #display percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-Sleep -seconds10                                    #wait 10 seconds more</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Start-PvsCreateDisk for VHD to PvsDiskLocator
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">TThis example creates a Fixed VHD Disk that has asize of 20 GB.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskLocator = Start-PvsCreateDisk -NametheDiskName -Size 20480 -StoreName theStore -SiteName theSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">while ($thePvsDiskLocator -eq$null)                           #while the create is processing</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished = Get-PvsCreateDiskStatus -NametheDiskName -StoreName theStore  # get percent finished orDiskLocator when done</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if (%percentFinished.GetType().Name =="PvsDiskLocator")</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsDiskLocator = %percentFinished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished.ToString() + "%finished"                 #display percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.8in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-Sleep -seconds10                                    #wait 10 seconds more</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
##Start-PvsDeviceBoot<a name="_Toc464196267"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Boot a Device, Collection or View. Returns a PvsTaskof the Task being run. With the PvsTask, call Get-PvsTaskStatus to get thepercent complete, Get-PvsTask to get the results, and Stop-PvsTask to stop itearly. The PvsTask Results has the DeviceName/value of the devices thatsucceeded in the first name/value pair of each record of the XML.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or DeviceId: GUID of the Device to Boot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or DeviceName: Name of the Device toBoot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsPhysicalAddress[] DeviceMac: MAC of the Device toBoot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid CollectionId: GUID of the Collection to Bootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteViewId: GUID of the Site View to Boot allDevices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid FarmViewId: GUID of the Farm View to Boot allDevices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string FarmViewName: Name of the Farm View to Bootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or one of these required ; resolutions</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string CollectionName: Name of the Collection toBoot all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteViewName: Name of the Site View to Bootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DeviceName, CollectionId, SiteViewId or FarmViewId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsTask: If successful, the PvsTask object for theprocess started is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsDeviceBoot for DeviceName to PvsTask
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Start-PvsDeviceBoot -DeviceNametheDevice              #start the task</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">while ($thePvsTask.State -eq0)                                #while the task is processing</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished = Get-PvsTaskStatus -Object$thePvsTask   # get percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished.ToString() + "%finished"                 #display percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-Sleep -seconds10                                    #wait 10 seconds more</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Get-PvsTask -Object$thePvsTask              #get the current PvsTask object</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if ($thePvsTask.State -eq2)                                   #check to see if completed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Cancelled"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Start-PvsDeviceBoot for DeviceMac
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceBoot -DeviceMac"00-11-22-33-44-55"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Start-PvsDeviceBoot for FarmViewName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceBoot -FarmViewName theFarmView</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Start-PvsDeviceBoot for CollectionName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceBoot -CollectionName theCollection-SiteName theSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">CollectionId can be used instead of CollectionNameso that the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 5: Start-PvsDeviceBoot for SiteViewName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceBoot -SiteViewName theSiteView-SiteName theSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SiteViewId can be used instead of SiteViewName sothat the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
##Start-PvsDeviceDiskTempVersionMode<a name="_Toc464196268"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Set a Temporary Disk Version for the specifiedDevice and optional DiskLocator. The Temporary Disk Version uses the productionversion that all production Devices boot from. Once set, the Device boots thisTemporary Disk Version instead of any currently assigned vDisk. Not supportedfor non-production and Personal vDisk Devices. Cannot be done when the theDevice already has a Temporary Disk Version, when the DiskLocator is usingserver side persistent cache mode or the active production version is inprivate mode.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or DeviceId: GUID of the Device to startto use a temporary disk version.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or DeviceName: Name of the Device tostart to use a temporary disk version.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsPhysicalAddress[] DeviceMac: MAC of the Device tostart to use a temporary disk version.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] DiskLocatorId: GUID of the Disk Locator touse a temporary version of. If not specified, the only Disk Locator assigned tothe Device is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or this optional ; resolution</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] DiskLocatorName: Name of the Disk Locatorto use a temporary version of. If not specified, the only Disk Locator assignedto the Device is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] StoreId: GUID of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DeviceId or DiskLocatorId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsDeviceDiskTempVersionMode for DeviceName withDiskLocatorName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceDiskTempVersionMode -Name theDevice-DiskLocatorName theDiskLocator -StoreName theStore</span></p>
##Start-PvsDeviceReboot<a name="_Toc464196269"></a>
<p style="margin-left:.4in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Reboot a Device, Collection or View. Returns aPvsTask of the Task being run. With the PvsTask, call Get-PvsTaskStatus to getthe percent complete, Get-PvsTask to get the results, and Stop-PvsTask to stopit early. The PvsTask Results has the DeviceName/value of the devices thatsucceeded in the first name/value pair of each record of the XML.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid[] Guid or DeviceId: GUID of the Device toReboot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string[] Name or DeviceName: Name of the Device toReboot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsPhysicalAddress[] DeviceMac: MAC of the Device toReboot.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid CollectionId: GUID of the Collection to Rebootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteViewId: GUID of the Site View to Reboot allDevices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid FarmViewId: GUID of the Farm View to Reboot allDevices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string FarmViewName: Name of the Farm View to Rebootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid DiskLocatorId: GUID of the DiskLocator toReboot all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or one of these required ; resolutions</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string CollectionName: Name of the Collection toReboot all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteViewName: Name of the Site View to Rebootall Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator toReboot all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Message: Message to display before rebootingthe Device(s). Default=The target device is being shutdown remotely by theConsole.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Delay: Number of seconds to delay beforerebooting the Device(s). Default=10</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Version: Version of the Disk to Reboot allDevices for. This is used with DiskLocatorId or DiskLocatorName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that is needed whena DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DeviceName, CollectionId, SiteViewId, FarmViewId orDiskLocatorId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "medium". If -Confirm is specified, the operation willbe confirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "medium" or"low" to have confirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsTask: If successful, the PvsTask object for theprocess started is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsDeviceReboot for DeviceName to PvsTask
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Start-PvsDeviceReboot -DeviceNametheDevice            #start the task</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">while ($thePvsTask.State -eq0)                                #while the task is processing</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished = Get-PvsTaskStatus -Object$thePvsTask   # get percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished.ToString() + "%finished"                 #display percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-Sleep -seconds10                                    #wait 10 seconds more</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Get-PvsTask -Object$thePvsTask              #get the current PvsTask object</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if ($thePvsTask.State -eq2)                                   #check to see if completed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Cancelled"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 2: Start-PvsDeviceReboot for DeviceMac
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceReboot -DeviceMac"00-11-22-33-44-55"</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Start-PvsDeviceReboot for FarmViewName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceReboot -FarmViewName theFarmView</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Start-PvsDeviceReboot for CollectionName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceReboot -CollectionName theCollection-SiteName theSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">CollectionId can be used instead of CollectionNameso that the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 5: Start-PvsDeviceReboot for SiteViewName
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-PvsDeviceReboot -SiteViewName theSiteView-SiteName theSite</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SiteViewId can be used instead of SiteViewName sothat the SiteName or SiteId is not also needed.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string CollectionName: Name of the Collection toShutdown all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteViewName: Name of the Site View toShutdown all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string DiskLocatorName: Name of the DiskLocator toShutdown all Devices.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Message: Message to display before shuttingdown the Device(s). Default=The target device is being shutdown remotely by theConsole.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">uint Version: Version of the Disk to Shutdown allDevices for. This is used with DiskLocatorId or DiskLocatorName.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid SiteId: GUID of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">One of these resolutions when needed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid StoreId: GUID of the Store that is needed whena DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string StoreName: Name of the Store that is neededwhen a DiskLocatorName is used.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "medium". <p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Start-PvsDeviceShutdown -DeviceNametheDevice          # startthe task</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if ($thePvsTask.State -eq2)                                   #check to see if completed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Cancelled"</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">or one of these required ; resolutions</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Name or SiteName: Name of the Site.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string ServerName: Name of the Server.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This required</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Summary: Short summary describing theproblem.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string SrNumber: Service Request number of thereported problem.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Description: Description of the reported problem.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">string Path: Path where problem report bundle issaved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">This optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">DateTime DateTime: DateTime around which thereported problem occured.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Instead of a parameter that matches one of themembers listed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsObject[] Object: PvsObjects with the membersbelow can be used as the Object parameter or from a pileline:</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.1in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SiteId or ServerId</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Optional</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">SwitchParameter Confirm: The impact of thisoperation is "low". If -Confirm is specified, the operation will beconfirmed. $ConfirmPreference can be set to "low" to haveconfirmation without the Confirm parameter.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:.7in;text-indent:-.2in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">PvsTask: If successful, the PvsTask object for theprocess started is returned.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 1: Start-PvsReportBug for SiteName to PvsTask
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Start-PvsReportBug -SiteName theSite-bugReportSummary test bugreport            #start the task</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">while ($thePvsTask.State -eq0)                                                                   #while the task is processing</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished = Get-PvsTaskStatus -Object$thePvsTask                                      #get percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">%percentFinished.ToString() + "%finished"                                                  #display percent finished</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Start-Sleep -seconds10                                                                       #wait 10 seconds more</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">$thePvsTask = Get-PvsTask -Object$thePvsTask                                                 #get the current PvsTask object</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">if ($thePvsTask.State -eq 2)                                                                      #check to see if completed</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Successful"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">else</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">{</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.4in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">"Cancelled"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">}</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsDiskLocator output is piped to the Unlock-PvsDisk.</span></p>

<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 3: Unlock-PvsDisk for Name with OwnerId
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Unlock-PvsDisk -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore -OwnerId = "e6c9884e-067c-4924-a581-312c699b4bb6"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
####EXAMPLE 4: Unlock-PvsDisk for PvsDiskLocator Using Pipe
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The Get-PvsDiskLocator output is piped to theUnlock-PvsDisk.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Get-PvsDiskLocator -Name theDiskLocator -SiteNametheSite -StoreName theStore -Fields Guid | Unlock-PvsDisk -OwnerId ="e6c9884e-067c-4924-a581-312c699b4bb6"</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">The -Fields parameter with only the needed fieldsspecified makes the Get work faster because only those fields are retrieved.</span></p>
<p style="margin-left:2.0in;text-indent:-1.4in"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"">Guid can be used instead of Name so that theSiteName or SiteId and StoreName or StoreId are not also needed.</span></p>
